Author: ukrainumedved
Content: From 1928 until 1942, a great depression has hit the largest power of Eusolarth. Thr United States of Savolia was hit with massive unemployment, bank failures, and many businesses failing. With the lack of workforce in Savolia, Savolian corporations was desperate to find a sustainable workforce, a large workforce that is cheap.....

Author: ukrainumedved
Content:
The SFR Novalia, was created after the 7 year long 2nd World war, after a revolution seizing the properties of the kings and the bourgoisie. In 1905, the Bosravatist revolution had taken significant portion of the crops and redistributed to the peasants. The factories were destroyed since the factory workers were forced to work on the fields. Collectivisation was mandatory, thus crops were shared to the peasants.

Mijal Khosevich died in his office in 1912, his general Roji Subenin takes over. Just 6 years later, he condemned Bosravatism, and proceeds tolaunch his first 5 year plan to boost the industrial output, mainly focusing on steel and infrastructural productions.

In 1928, his 3rd year plan came, mainly focusing on consumer goods. Seeing the big businessess being affrcted by the great depression, Novalia pulled an offer of investments to Novalia. Despite being communist, they managed to pull them off because of their cheap labour. However from 1930, Novalia forcefully imposes 75 percent tax to the companies. For years, Savolia's economy has been bled, dried by Novalian interests.....

Author: ukrainumedved
Content: It stopped until 1939, however communist movements had grown significantly due to Novalia's funds towards the movements. With paranoia, Savolia with growing paranoia, builds up its military once again, to perhaps end the communist power. In 1946, the 3rd world war starts.....
